name: css-gridish-grid
description: Only the Grid from IBM/css-gridish as an NPM module

scripts.build: LIB=Gridish MODULE_DIR=distribution/modules MAIN_DIR=distribution/main run-s build:* prepare-distribution
scripts.build:module: tsc --module es2015 --target es2015 --outDir $MODULE_DIR && npm run minify -- -o $MODULE_DIR/$LIB.min.js -- $MODULE_DIR/$LIB.js
scripts.build:main: tsc --module commonjs --target es5 --outDir $MAIN_DIR && npm run minify -- -o $MAIN_DIR/$LIB.min.js -- $MAIN_DIR/$LIB.js
scripts.prepare-distribution: for file in distribution/**/*; do sed -i '' "s/$LIB.js/${LIB,,}.js/g" $file && mv -v $file `echo ${file,,}`; done;
scripts.start: babel source/Gridish.ts -x .ts --watch --out-file dev/Gridish.js --source-maps inline | http-server dev -o

author: Rafael Milewski
